title: Faint background logo behind About section on Trusted Electrical Contractors page

requirements.summary: Add BMLOGO-1.jpg as a faint background behind the About BM ENTERPRISES section on the Trusted Electrical Contractors landing page while preserving text readability.
acceptanceCriteria: The "About BM ENTERPRISES" section on the Trusted Electrical Contractors page displays BMLOGO-1.jpg as a background image with low opacity (faint effect).
The background image is positioned behind the section content (does not shift layout or overlap text/buttons).
Text in the section remains clearly readable on all screen sizes (desktop and mobile).
The background image is loaded as a static frontend asset (not routed through the backend).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded image as a static public asset so it can be referenced directly by the Trusted Electrical Contractors page (no backend involvement).

Update the "Company Overview" / "About BM ENTERPRISES" section to use a relative container with an absolutely-positioned background layer rendering /assets/BMLOGO-1.jpg with low opacity and appropriate positioning/sizing; ensure the content wrapper is above the background (z-index) and remains readable across breakpoints using existing React + Tailwind CSS patterns.
